item.title: Adding Images to Hugo Sites
item.description: Goal Add images to your Hugo site pages using the appropriate method for your use case. Methods Page Bundles Place images alongside your markdown file: content/posts/my-post/ ├── index.md ├── my-image.jpg Reference in index.md: ![Alt text](my-image.jpg) or with full path: ![Alt text](/posts/my-post/my-image.jpg) Static Directory For globally shared images: static/images/my-image.jpg Reference in markdown: ![Alt text](/images/my-image.jpg) Hugo Figure Shortcode For captions and additional styling: Image Title With static directory: Image Title External URLs !
